definitions.definition: a person, especially a police officer, whose occupation is to investigate and solve crimes.
examples: investigator, private investigator, private detective, police detective, operative; Moreinformalprivate eye, PI, sleuth, snoop, shamus, gumshoe, Sherlock; informal,dick, private dick "they hired a detective to track down Polk's former partner"Moreprivate eye, PI, sleuth, snoop, shamus, gumshoe, Sherlock; dick, private dick they hired a detective to track down Polk's former partner

definitions.definition: denoting a particular rank of police officer.
